nifty.name: Nifty Gallery
nifty.text: My first full-stack project. This is the official website for Nifty Gallery (a local art gallery). I used html, css & javascript, then converted it to a Wordpress template for the client's CMS.

vue-fullstack.name: Vue JS Guest Book
vue-fullstack.text: This a simple guest book app that stores the data in a NoSQL database. I used node /w express for the back end, vue js for the front end and mongoDB for the database. The styling is just a bit of pure css using flex box.

old-site.name: Old Portfolio Site
old-site.text: This is the predecessor to this site. I used a lot of JS libraries, which made it a bit slow and glitchy. For the back-end I used node /w express and the rest was simple html, css and jQuery.

this-site.name: This Site
this-site.text: This site is all pure css & vanilla javascript, that I designed and built. The projects are called with ajax from a JSON api & the backend is Express. Also please try the responsive design by changing the screen size.

easy-poll.name: Easy Poll Maker
easy-poll.text: [Still in production] This will be a site for a user to create a poll then other users to come and vote on. I’m using node /w Express, Mongo DB and Vue JS. Check my GitHub for the repo.

rgb_game.name: RGB Colour Game
rgb_game.text: This is one of my first ever prjects, its a small colour picking game. I used; HTML, CSS and vinilla JS.

calculator.name: Calculator
calculator.text: This is an old project. This is just a simple js calculator. I used; HTML, CSS and vinilla JS.

Sass_Float_Grid.name: Sass Float Grid
Sass_Float_Grid.text: This is a float grid system similar to bootstraps grid system. A bit outdated, now I use flex-box mostly.

css_flip_cards.name: Animated Flip Cards
css_flip_cards.text: These are flip animation cards I designed and built using pure css/sass. This was a challenge I gave myself to help me get used to scss.

Quiz.name: Quiz game
Quiz.text: This is a Vue only project. I made this to get more accustomed with using front end frameworks. It gets quiz questions from a REST api, the user then picks an answer and it keeps track of their score.

vue-fullstack.name: Vue JS Guest Book
vue-fullstack.text: This a simple guest book app that stores the data in a NoSQL database. I used node /w express and vue js for the front end. Styling is just a bit of pure css w/ flex box.. No frameworks.

easy-poll.name: Easy Poll Maker
easy-poll.text: Still in production. It will be a site that a user will be able to create a poll for other users to come and vote on. I’m using node /w Express, Mongo DB and Vue JS. Check my GitHub for the repo.

crypto.name: Crypto Chatbot
crypto.text: This is a chatbot where a user sends a message with a currency code and it returns a message with the latest prices that it gets from an api. Currently under review from facebook.
